criteria: Accurate Use of Academic and Domain-Specific Vocabulary
descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding or use of grade-appropriate academic and domain-specific vocabulary.
Demonstrates very limited understanding and use of grade-appropriate academic and domain-specific vocabulary. Vocabulary use is often inaccurate or inappropriate.
Demonstrates some understanding and use of grade-appropriate academic and domain-specific vocabulary. Vocabulary use may contain inaccuracies.
Demonstrates adequate understanding and use of grade-appropriate academic and domain-specific vocabulary. Vocabulary is generally accurate and appropriate.
Demonstrates strong understanding and use of grade-appropriate academic and domain-specific vocabulary. Vocabulary is accurate, varied, and enhances communication.
Demonstrates sophisticated understanding and skillful use of grade-appropriate academic and domain-specific vocabulary. Vocabulary is precise, nuanced, and elevates the quality of expression.
Shows no attempt to gather vocabulary knowledge when encountering unfamiliar words or phrases.
Shows minimal attempt to gather vocabulary knowledge; unable to apply new vocabulary to enhance comprehension or expression.
Attempts to gather vocabulary knowledge are inconsistent; application of new vocabulary is limited and sometimes inaccurate.
Gathers vocabulary knowledge with some consistency; demonstrates a basic ability to apply new vocabulary to aid comprehension or expression.
Actively gathers vocabulary knowledge and applies it effectively to enhance comprehension and expression.
Consistently and independently gathers vocabulary knowledge, applying it with precision and flair to elevate both comprehension and expression.
Unable to determine word meaning from context.
Struggles to determine word meaning from context; guesses are often inaccurate.
Can sometimes determine word meaning from context with prompting, but understanding is superficial.
Can usually determine word meaning from context; demonstrates adequate contextual understanding.
Demonstrates a strong ability to determine word meaning from context and to use context clues to refine understanding.
Demonstrates exceptional ability to determine word meaning from context, using subtle clues to develop a nuanced understanding.
